content.text: This is a list of photography tools which I use

enumitem.noop: Fedora Linux as the Desktop Operating System
FreeBSD as NAS system (rsync, Samba share)
DigiKam to import and sort/order Photos. As well as batch processing non-RAW images.
Dark Table for processing RAW images.
The GIMP for manual processing JPEG images.
Qiv (Quick picture viewer) for quick image viewing.
Photoalbum for simple and fast web albums.
ImageMagick / Perl / ZSH for various custom scripts.
